Question
========

You buy 15 lottery tickets for €1 each. With each lottery ticket you have a chance of 0.06 to win €10. If you take into account the cost of the lottery tickets, what is your expected profit?

Answerlist
----------

* € 150
* € 10
* € 9
* - € 6

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* € 150: Incorrect
* 10 €: Incorrect
* 9 €: Incorrect
* - € 6: Correct
